name: linebot-community-activity-management
description: A configurable LINE chatbot system for community activity management with AI-powered FAQ, RSVP functionality, and event scheduling.

scripts.build: rimraf dist && esbuild src/main.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/main.js --charset=utf8 --format=esm && cp appsscript.json dist/
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && cp .clasp.dev.json .clasp.json && clasp push --force
scripts.deploy:stg: npm run build && cp .clasp.stg.json .clasp.json && clasp push --force
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && cp .clasp.prod.json .clasp.json && clasp push --force

author: Community Activity Management System Contributors
